  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Constructor of Customer class.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the customer.
      surname - the surname of the customer.
      email - the email of the customer.
      password - the password of the customer.

  • Method Details

    • getCustomerNumber

      public int getCustomerNumber()
      Getter for special number of customer.
      Returns:
      the customer number.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder​(Order order)
      Adds the given order to the customer's order history.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to be added to the order history.

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe​(AutomationSystem system)
      Customer subscribes to the system. Customer number set to hash code of the customer object. Because hash code is unique for every distinct object.
      Parameters:
      system - the system to be subscribed.

    • searchProducts

      public void searchProducts​(java.lang.String modelName)
      Customers can search for a specific product by entering its name.
      Parameters:
      modelName - the name of the model to be searched.

    • seeProducts

      public void seeProducts​(MutableArray<Furniture> goodsToBeListed)
      Lists the given furniture list with names containing their model, color and price.
      Parameters:
      goodsToBeListed - the furnitures to be listed to the customer.

    • seeWhereTheProduct

      public void seeWhereTheProduct​(Furniture product)
      Let's you see which branch has the product.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be searched.

    • shopOnline

      public void shopOnline​(Branch branch, Furniture product)
      Lets the customer shop online by using automation system. Customer needs to supply her/his address and phone number.
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch that customer buy the product from.
      product - the product that is going to be sold.

    • shopOnlineTest

      public void shopOnlineTest​(Branch branch, Furniture product)
      This method is only for testing purposes. Original method needs user interaction.
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch that customer buy the product from.
      product - the product that is going to be sold.

    • viewOrders

      public void viewOrders()
      Lets the user see his/her order history.
